category.name: Data Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Baseline_allow_edits
preference.preference_description: Determines whether the item ID of baselined objects can be modified. Set this preference to ON to allow users to edit the item ID of items that have been baselined. Once the item is released, the item ID can no longer be modified. Valid Values: ON - Users can edit the item ID of items that have been baselined. Once the item is released, the item ID can no longer be modified. OFF - Users cannot edit the item ID of baselined items.
